name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Khiri ARTER, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Khiri ARTER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of July, 2015, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by Petitioner, is as follows:
Whether the Superior Court erred in upholding the Revocation Court’s denial of Petitioner’s motion to exclude evidence obtained in violation of the Petitioner’s privacy rights under Article I, Section 8 of the Pennsylvania Constitution?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
120 A.3d 299
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Khiri ARTER, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 28, 2015.
